doc:
Larissa Laskin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Larissa_Laskin 0 Larissa Laskin is a Canadian actress whose credits include the A original film, The Golden Spiders: A Nero Wolfe Mystery (2000). Laskin debuted in My Secret Identity in the early 1990s. In 2002-2003, she co-starred as Dr. Rachel Griffen in the medical drama Body and Soul on the PAX network. She also appeared as a doctor held hostage by a father (Denzel Washington) in an attempt to save his son in John Q. Born Larissa Lapchinski, Laskin appeared under that name in a number of stage productions in the 1980s at the Stratford Festival in Ontario. She is currently married to fellow Canadian actor Currie Graham. Larissa_Laskin is a_Canadian_actress whose_credits include the_A , The_Golden_Spiders : A_Nero_Wolfe_Mystery ( 2000 ) . Laskin debuted in My_Secret_Identity in the_early_1990s . In 2002-2003 , she co-starred as Dr._Rachel_Griffen in the_medical_drama_Body_and_Soul on the_PAX_network . She also appeared as a_doctor held hostage by a_father_(_Denzel_Washington_) in an_attempt to_save his_son in John_Q._Born_Larissa_Lapchinski , Laskin appeared under that_name in a_number of stage_productions in the_1980s at the_Stratford_Festival in Ontario . She is_currently_married to fellow_Canadian_actor_Currie_Graham .
